item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (381 points | 364 comments)

9. Posh (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)

23. 12 years of Backblaze data center storage drives, visualized (105 points | 40 comments)

25. Tesla recalls 380k vehicles in US over power steering assist issue (147 points | 134 comments)
26. Bybit CEO Confirms Exchange Was Hacked for $1.46B (67 points | 45 comments)
27. Introduction to CUDA programming for Python developers (318 points | 87 comments)
